title: build an apk app for our iptv portal
desc: Hello all talented devs,I am in the Android IPTV/OTT set-top box market. I want to create a set-top box emulator or app for this popular middleware known as – Stalker Middleware – which is free and open source software that is available and made by Infomir for operators to use. There is an API available for this middleware, I will attach the documentation for the middleware and V1 of the rest API.I would need someone to build this project as I can explain more details if you are interested.I am looking for a developer who is familiar with (or willing to learn) stalker middleware and their mag stb’s (set-top boxes from informir based off Linux) to create an emulator/app for android 6.0 with UI re-design that I will provide. This has already been done by 3 other people and I would like to replicate it. Below I will attach as much information as I can for you to understand and see. I believe unless you install the middleware it's self on a dev server and learn it and see how it functions you will be able to successfully finish this job. If you can see the end points of the API perhaps you will be able to create an app that directly has these functions: Live TV, VoD, EPG, Favorites, and Parental Lock - where it pulls the contents from the operators server to successfully deliver the contents to the client side through the Android stb.

title: modifications to an existing App - GoMobile Network Test
desc: DEG needs the services of an experienced Android developer to make some modifications to an existing App -search for GoMobile Network Test. Once the testing is completed, the user logs on to the web portal to access the raw results. This can be found at [url removed, login to view]The current work is estimated to be worth approximately $750-1000 USWe have a number of additional projects to undertake with the app but need to confirm that the Freelancer team can work on this type of app.The specific changes required now are:Priority 1GoMobile - Network Performance Testing (NPT) module the app generates three 0 black results even when it does the download and ping successfully and then fails on the upload. Please review to ensure it can represent a positive result for the first two and then a 0 for the upload. It is the upload that fails in most networks. The same change needs to be applied to the Time Series Testing and the extended NPT modulesGoMobile - Network Performance testing module can you implement a choice for the tester in settings that offers to do the NPT in either the current Full or a Lite version that samples the speedtest for a max of [url removed, login to view] download and the upload for only 250kbp? This will suit the more remote testing locationsGoMobile app I have a client that wants to be able to provide access to the app to 50-100 different people, but that all of their results come to the single account this is something that we will offer clients moving forwards.Priority 2GoMobile - the Call Drop feature is not working to full capacity. Where the phone is "out of range" then it is not able to make a call and therefore not creating a call drop pin. This is under generating the true number of calls in a location. You may have to create a different pin the represents the time where the phone is out of range and unable to achieve any type of network call? Priority 2GoMobile app requires the user to have network coverage in order to connect. we semi-regularly find ourselves in a place where the app freezes and the only way to move forwards is to close the app. If that occurs where we are out of network coverage then we cant continue to test. Can you modify the app so that like a Windows 10/log in if off line it will use the last login? Is there another way to resolve this?  Priority 1

title: Create iPhone + Android application
desc: We need a hybrid mobile Audio Application(with Offline Support) which should work perfectly on both iPhone and Android.Basic Requirements are :- Login Screen ( Social as well as Email Registration Based Login) with data stored in google Firebase.- After Login the user will be shown cards, with image, play time, and Play Button for the audios,  which are clickable. at a time only 20 Cards will be loaded and infinite scroll has to be implemented to display the cards as we go.- On Clicking any card, more information about the audio will be displayed and audio should start playing.- Audio player should handle all the events like locking the screen, playing audio in background, handling device events gracefully.- Audio player controls should be visible throughout the app, once the audio is started. If nothing is playing the audio controls should not show.- User should be able to download the files, in a secure app folder on both Android and iPhone, And no other app should have access to these files. Files can go upto 1GB.- User should be able to view his offline media, and should be able to play it as a normal playback within the app.- When offline, User should be able to view all the cards.To apply for this project, You must submit with all the details, how will you implement it, tools you will use, and how will you achieve all the above requirements. Also mention the time you will take to complete the project. You should also mention how will you achieve the same user experience on both iPhone and Android.  If you need more information, just shoot me a message.Links to your previously developed Apps is a must. If you can send links to the apps which match the requirements above that would be great.
